name: hipster-ipsum
title: Hipster ipsum
description: Generate placeholder content using the official Hipster Ipsum API https://hipsum.co/the-api/
author: plev

commands.name: generate-placeholder-text
commands.title: Generate placeholder text
commands.description: Simply generate placeholder text with extension options

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
